venue.name: City Table at the Lenox Hotel

item.description:
Native Jim Monaghan has entered the contest!

Will there be Natives attending this unusual Benefit party for Community Servings at City Table in the Lenox Hotel from 6-9 pm on Wednesday, February 29, 2012?

To wrap up Community Servings Sponsor My Stache fundraiser, they will be having a Mustachio Bashio Party to thank all of the growers, raise money for Community Servings, and to celebrate all things mustachioed! With your $50.00 ticket enjoy complimentary cocktails, hors d'oeuvres and help the judge Jenny Johnson of NECN pick the best mustaches. Gentleman and ladies who arrive mustachioed will be entered into a special raffle for a chance to win a fabulous prize. Natives and their guests must purchase their tickets in advance on the Community Servings web site.[url=www.servings.org][/url] Additional information about Community Servings, the event and Mustache Growing Contest is available on line or by contacting Megan Lerner at mlerner@servings.org or 617-522-7777. Men who wish to be a part of the contest must enter by February 1 by contacting Community Servings.

Several of us attended other years parties and they have been some of the best fundraisers that I have attended.

And if you are one of the single women who missed out on all of the men at this event last year, here is your mulligan!
item.how_to_find_us: E Mail will be sent after people purchase tickets
item.name: Mustachio Bashio Benefit for Community Servings
